fireDialogHeaderNoTabs.title: Počisti podatke
fireDialogHeaderNoTabs.note: Dialog header when tab clearing is disabled.

optionCurrentSite.title: Samo trenutna stran
optionCurrentSite.note: Dropdown option to only clear data for the current active website

optionLastHour.title: Zadnja ura
optionLastHour.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the past hour

optionLast24Hour.title: Zadnjih 24 ur
optionLast24Hour.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the past 24 hours

optionLast7days.title: Zadnjih 7 dni
optionLast7days.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the past 7 days

optionLast4Weeks.title: Zadnje 4 tedne
optionLast4Weeks.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the past 4 weeks

optionAllTime.title: Ves čas
optionAllTime.note: Dropdown option to clear all data, since recording started

historyDuration.title: {duration, select, hour {ene ure} day {24 ur} week {enega tedna} month {4 tednov} other {Vse}}
historyDuration.note: Description of what period of history data should be deleted.

summaryClearTabsHistoryDuration.title: {openTabs, plural, one {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihek ter počistiti zgodovino brskanja in piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?} two {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihka ter počistiti zgodovino brskanja in piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?} few {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihke ter počistiti zgodovino brskanja in piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?} other {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihkov ter počistiti zgodovino brskanja in piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?}}
summaryClearTabsHistoryDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Placeholders stand for: 1. the number of tabs that will be affected; 2. the timespan of data to be removed (translated separately with key historyDuration). Example: Close 3 tabs and clear 2 weeks of browsing…

summaryClearTabsDuration.title: {openTabs, plural, one {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihek in počistiti piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?} two {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihka in počistiti piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?} few {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihke in počistiti piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?} other {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihkov in počistiti piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?}}
summaryClearTabsDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Placeholders stand for: 1. the number of tabs that will be affected; 2. the timespan of data to be removed (translated separately with key historyDuration). Example: Close 3 tabs and clear 2 weeks of cookies?

summaryClearHistoryDuration.title: Želite počistiti zgodovino brskanja in piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?
summaryClearHistoryDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholder stands for the timespan of data to be removed (translated separately with key historyDuration). Example: Clear 2 weeks of browsing…

summaryClearCookiesDuration.title: Želite počistiti piškotke za obdobje {durationDesc}?
summaryClearCookiesDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholder stands for the timespan of data to be removed (translated separately with key historyDuration). Example: Clear 2 weeks of cookies?

summaryClearTabsHistoryAll.title: Želite zapreti {openTabs} {openTabs, plural, =1 {zavihek} other {zavihka/-e/-ov}} ter počistiti vso zgodovino brskanja in piškotke ({cookies} {cookies, plural, =1 {spletnega mesta} other {spletnih mest}})?
summaryClearTabsHistoryAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholders are for the number of tabs to be closed, and the number of sites where we'll clear cookies. Example: Close 3 tabs, and clear browsing history and cookies (2 sites)?

summaryClearTabsAll.title: Želite zapreti {openTabs} {openTabs, plural, =1 {zavihek} other {zavihka/-e/-ov}} in počistiti vse piškotke ({cookies} {cookies, plural, =1 {spletnega mesta} other {spletnih mest}})?
summaryClearTabsAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholders are for the number of tabs to be closed, and the number of sites where we'll clear cookies. Example: Close 3 tabs, and clear all cookies (2 sites)?

summaryClearHistoryAll.title: {cookies, plural, one {Želite izbrisati vso zgodovino brskanja in piškotke (za {cookies} spletno mesto)?} two {Želite izbrisati vso zgodovino brskanja in piškotke (za {cookies} spletni mesti)?} few {Želite izbrisati vso zgodovino brskanja in piškotke (za {cookies} spletna mesta)?} other {Želite izbrisati vso zgodovino brskanja in piškotke (za {cookies} spletnih mest)?}}
summaryClearHistoryAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholders stand for the number of sites where we'll clear cookies. Example: Clear all browsing history and cookies (2 sites)?

summaryClearCookiesAll.title: {cookies, plural, one {Želite počistiti vse piškotke (za {cookies} spletno mesto)?} two {Želite počistiti vse piškotke (za {cookies} spletni mesti)?} few {Želite počistiti vse piškotke (za {cookies} spletna mesta)?} other {Želite počistiti vse piškotke (za {cookies} spletnih mest)?}}
summaryClearCookiesAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholders stand for the number of sites where we'll clear cookies. Example: Clear all cookies (2 sites)?

summaryClearTabsHistorySite.title: {openTabs, plural, one {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihek spletnega mesta {site} in izbrisati vse piškotke spletnega mesta {site}?} two {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihka spletnega mesta {site} in izbrisati vse piškotke spletnega mesta {site}?} few {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihke spletnega mesta {site} in izbrisati vse piškotke spletnega mesta {site}?} other {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihkov spletnega mesta {site} in izbrisati vse piškotke spletnega mesta {site}?}}
summaryClearTabsHistorySite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Example: "Close 3 example.com tabs, and clear all example.com cookies?".

summaryClearTabsSite.title: {openTabs, plural, one {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihek spletnega mesta {site} in izbrisati vse piškotke spletnega mesta {site}?} two {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihka spletnega mesta {site} in izbrisati vse piškotke spletnega mesta {site}?} few {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihke spletnega mesta {site} in izbrisati vse piškotke spletnega mesta {site}?} other {Želite zapreti {openTabs} zavihkov spletnega mesta {site} in izbrisati vse piškotke spletnega mesta {site}?}}
summaryClearTabsSite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Example: "Close 3 example.com tabs, and clear all example.com cookies?".

summaryClearHistorySite.title: Želite izbrisati vso zgodovino brskanja in piškotke za spletno mesto {site}?
summaryClearHistorySite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Example: Clear all example.com browsing history and cookies?

summaryClearCookiesSite.title: Želite izbrisati vse piškotke za spletno mesto {site})?
summaryClearCookiesSite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Clear all example.com cookies?

summaryPinnedIgnored.title: {tabs, plural, one {{tabs} pripet zavihek bo prezrt.} two {{tabs} pripeta zavihka bosta prezrta.} few {{tabs} pripeti zavihki bodo prezrti.} other {{tabs} pripetih zavihkov bo prezrtih.}}
summaryPinnedIgnored.note: Notice to tell the user that some tabs will not be closed. Example: 3 pinned tabs will be ignored.

clearData.title: Počisti
clearData.note: Button text to start data clearing.

cancel.title: Preklic
cancel.note: Button text to exit the fire button modal.

historyAndDownloadsNotAffected.title: Če želite počistiti tudi zgodovino, izberite časovno obdobje.
historyAndDownloadsNotAffected.note: Notice to tell the user that the chosen clearing settings will not affect history and downloads because a time period has not been selected from the dropdown.
